Articles.Content:
KSP Version: Latest on Steam as of 12/27. Linux x86_64 (Ubuntu 14). NVidia GTX 670 - proprietary drivers.

What Happens: Game drops to less than 1 FPS when panning/rotating with right mouse button.

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Steps to Replicate:

1) Started Mun pt1 tutorial

2) Panned around with RMB - everything smooth

3) Dropped into map

4) Clicked on orbit to create a maneuver

5) Panning is now always less than 1 FPS, even when the maneuver is deleted

Result: Game unplayable - impossible to create an intercepting orbit due to lag.

Fixes/Workarounds:

- None. Tried reducing GFX to bare minimum, no improvement.

- Game runs perfectly smooth otherwise.

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:

http://pastebin.com/FDHuF8an

Pretty sure this is caused by anti aliasing or maybe bad drivers, this looks like it can't be right for example:

GL: Detected 0 MB VRAM
